column5: So who are the fortunate fisherman returning to the BOQ this weekend?  Mike

well ive done 3 weekends in a row and dont think the bank account   will allow it this time,i have alot of family things and other stuff to do as well.so last weekend might have been it for me,with xmas just around the corner and all.  but ya never know ill wait and see

I'm heading up there this coming Saturday to Wednesday.  Not looking forward to the weather coming though.     But that is the kind of weather we are suppose to get anyhow.  Should be good, as long as the wind isn't that bad and I bundle up.
Definitely going to be a major shift in the weather, hope you guys do well...  Mike
i was thinking about going this sunday, with the cold snap coming in what changes should be made for ideal presentation?
Nothing will change just dress warm and slide some hotpaws in your .And please send some pics.good luck

Finally, hoping maybe these cooler temps will open up some more water... even mid week now your zig zagging lines and boats.  Busiest Ever.  As for presentation with this incoming system, try higher in the water column and a slower/wide wobble bait...  Good luck..
